answers.answer: Hello.May I know the reason why she was admitted ? Is it possible for you to describe the events that lead to her unconscious state.I understand that she has diabetes, hypertension and epilepsy. I can only guess that she may have had either an episode of increased blood pressure leading to a stroke. But I would really appreciate if you can narrate the EEG report here.Since her breathing is supported, you have to keep a regular watch on the brain activity with the EEG.Hope to hear from you soon .Regards

question: Dear Doctor,Hi,My Mother AGE 65 has been hospitalized for 12 Days, and she is unconscious, her breath is supported by a ventilator. all the clinical, urine, Ultrasound. Reports are OK. in EEG report it was came to know that during EEG test she had faced seizures fits of medium level. it is pertinent to mention here that she was a patient of diabetes, hypertension and occasionally faced minor fits of epilepsy.  Kindly Solicit advise either by your honor or refer to any concern for consultation. As we have all the scanned reports which could be sent to you for your considerationYour anticipation will be highly appreciated.
title: M.Asif
